about_the_game:
N31 is currently under pre-production development, this means that a huge part of its design can change.

N31 is set in the modern city of Monfalco. A young pilot, trying to discover the truth about his father’s death, will face local gangs to unravel the mystery they hide, becoming the first in the ranking. Taking inspiration from games like Need for Speed , Automodellista and Driftcity.
N31 grants the player a rich and enjoyable gameplay, where you can chose to have a car which is made for drifting or another which is made to go fast - but those are not the only options! You can also customize your car as much as you like and take pictures to share on the N31 social media. This will give you enough fame to participate in new events. But as everyone knows, no race is ever safe, police will always be around chasing racers. What could start as a fun night in Monfalco, might turn into a chasing nightmare.

Features

  • Cell shading art style
  • Arcade style driving, fun to play and it's easy to get in.
  • Open world map that feels alive, events will randomly spawn to entertain the player, environment changes based on the season and on the weather, this will also impact driving and visibility.
  • Impressive customization on cars, this will allow each player to feel unique and different from everyone else.
  • Collectibles that will allow you to unlock hidden events, customizations as well as exotic cars.
  • Online Leaderboards for Drift score and Race time.
  • Social Media which will allow you to see other players’ picture car and vote up or down.

What to do

  • Experience a new way to drive low poly cars! In N31 you will be driving Arcade Style low poly cars, exploring city with them and face up rivals everyday!
  • Test your driving skills with Hyper mode, a series of test in different circuit, the best score and time will be published in the online leaderboard!
  • Split screen multiplayer! Yeah, back we're in 2000! you can now beat your friends in 1 screen with the split screen multiplayer mode!
